snippet: Samsung Electronics said it would double its dividend and increase spending on acquisitions, but some investors grumbled that the company was still being stingy with its cash.
abstract: Samsung Electronics says it will double its dividend and increase spending on acquisitions, but some investors grumble that the company is still being stingy with its cash.
lead_paragraph: Samsung Electronics said it would double its dividend and increase spending on acquisitions, but some investors grumbled that the company was still being stingy with its cash.

headline.main: Samsung’s Investment Plan Falls Short for Some
headline.print_headline: Samsung’s Spending Plan Leaves Some Investors Cold
